Description: Maximum divergency rate allowed between the input sequence and the reported matches (i.e. maximum number of mismatches or indels allowed). All global-Matches above this error rate will be discarded
Minimum global-alignment identity required (i.e. total number of matching bases). All global-matches below this identity will be discared
Minimum global-alignment score required (i.e. gap-affine score). All global-matches with score below this threshold will be discarded
Minimum local-alignment identity required (i.e. total number of matching bases). All local-matches below this identity will be discarded
Minimum global-alignment score required (i.e. gap-affine score). All global-matches with score below this threshold will be discarded
Enable Paired-End mapping mode (in case a single FASTA/FASTQ input is given)

Maximum template length allowed (distance between the beginning of the left-most mapped read and the end of the right-most mapped read). All matches with longer template length will be discarded as discordant.
